record.title: Development and evaluation of a machine learning model for osteoporosis risk prediction in Korean women.
record.subjects: Republic of Korea ; Machine Learning ; Osteoporosis epidemiology ; Osteoporosis diagnosis ; Humans ; Female ; Middle Aged ; Republic of Korea epidemiology ; Adult ; Aged ; Risk Assessment methods ; Risk Factors ; Cohort Studies
record.abstract: Declarations. Ethics approval and consent to participate: This study was conducted following the guidelines of the Declaration of Helsinki, with all subjects providing written informed consent. This study was approved by the Institutional Review Board of Gyeongsang National University (GIRB-A22-NX-0073) and the Korean Health and Genomic study at the Korea National Institute of Health (NBK-2023-003). Consent for publication: Not required. Competing interests: The authors declare no competing interests.
record.contributors: Je, Minkyung ; Hwang, Seunghyeon ; Lee, Suwon ; Kim, Yoona
